title: Cardi B flashes bra in splashy two-tone leather suit
text:
Cardi B was a showstopper while arriving at the star-studded Vogue Forces Of Fashion Conference in New York on Thursday.

The 26-year-old rapper showcased her surgically enhanced curves in a fitted color-block leather trouser suit for her outing.

Her suit was sea green on one side and bright orange on the other, slipping into a see-through top that flashed her bra.

Looking fab: Cardi B was a showstopper while arriving at the star-studded Vogue Forces Of Fashion Conference in New York on Thursday

Cardi, who shares her one-year-old daughter Kulture with her husband Offset of Migos fame, accentuated her unmistakable features with makeup.

The New York native's latest appearance comes after her feature film debut Hustlers, starring Jennifer Lopez and Constance Wu, released last month to rave reviews.

Guests at the conference this Thursday included the iconic 1990s Supermodel Cindy Crawford, who was joined by her 18-year-old daughter Kaia Gerber.

When you got it: The 26-year-old rapper showcased her surgically enhanced curves in a fitted color-block leather trouser suit for her outing

Dropping hints: Her suit was sea green on one side and bright orange on the other, slipping into a see-through top that flashed her bra

Glowing: Cardi, who shares her one-year-old daughter Kulture with her husband Offset of Migos fame, accentuated her unmistakable features with makeup

New frontier: The New York native's latest appearance comes after her feature film debut Hustlers, starring Jennifer Lopez and Constance Wu, released last month to rave reviews

Family business: Guests at the conference this Thursday included the iconic 1990s Supermodel Cindy Crawford, who was joined by her 18-year-old daughter Kaia Gerber

Kaia, who like her brother Presley has followed her mother's footsteps into the modeling business, could be glimpsed emerging from the venue with Cindy.

The pair of them were both holding the brand new November issue of American Vogue, which has Rihanna on the cover.

Kaia and Cindy were interviewed onstage at the event by the magazine's onetime fashion director Tonne Goodman, according to Vogue.

On the go: Kaia, who like her brother Presley has followed her mother's footsteps into the modeling business, could be glimpsed emerging from the venue with Cindy

Reading material: The pair of them were both holding the brand new November issue of American Vogue, which has Rihanna on the cover

Only the best: Kaia and Cindy were interviewed onstage at the event by the magazine's onetime fashion director Tonne Goodman, according to Vogue

Cindy wrapped a grey blazer over a blue and grey print sweater for the big event, slipping into a wide-set pair of blue slacks.

The mother-daughter duo met up with Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Wintour inside the conference, where they were photographed by Corey Tenold.

Julianne Moore got to reunite at the event with Tom Ford, having featured in his 2009 directorial debut A Single Man starring Colin Firth.

Sleek and chic: Cindy wrapped a grey blazer over a blue and grey print sweater for the big event, slipping into a wide-set pair of blue slacks

Top brass: The mother-daughter duo met up with Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Wintour inside the conference, where they were photographed by Corey Tenold
description: Cardi B was a showstopper while arriving at the star-studded Vogue Forces Of Fashion Conference in New York on Thursday.
